@context.title: @Context
@context.description: Specifies the vocabulary employed for understanding the structured data markup.

@type.title: Submission Type
@type.description: Submission type can include various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

name.title: Name or Title
name.description: A text string with a descriptive name or title for the resource.

description.title: Description or Abstract
description.description: A text string containing a description/abstract for the resource.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL for the landing page that describes the resource and where the content of the resource can be accessed. If there is no landing page, provide the URL of the content.

identifier.title: Identifiers
identifier.description: Any kind of identifier for the resource. Multiple identifiers can be entered. Where identifiers can be encoded as URLs, enter URLs here.

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: Person or organization that created the work.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: DELETEME

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing the full name of the person. Personal name format: Family Name, Given Name

email.title: Email
email.description: A string containing an email address for the person

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifiers for the person. Where identifiers can be encoded as URLs, enter URLs here.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: DELETEME

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the provider organization or repository.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL to the homepage for the organization.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifiers for the person or organization. Where identifiers can be encoded as URLs, enter URLs here.

address.title: Address
address.description: Full address for the organization - e.g., “8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200”.

dateCreated.title: Date Created
dateCreated.description: The date on which the resource was created.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Keywords or tags used to describe the dataset, delimited by commas.

license.title: License
license.description: A license document that applies to the content, typically indicated by a URL.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Submission type can include various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

name.title: Name
name.description: A text string indicating the name of the license under which the resource is shared.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL for a web page that describes the license.

description.title: Description
description.description: A text string describing the license or containing the text of the license itself.

provider.title: Provider
provider.description: The repository, service provider, organization, person, or service performer that provides access to the resource.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: DELETEME

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the provider organization or repository.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL to the homepage for the organization.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifiers for the person or organization. Where identifiers can be encoded as URLs, enter URLs here.

address.title: Address
address.description: Full address for the organization - e.g., “8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200”.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: DELETEME

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing the full name of the person. Personal name format: Family Name, Given Name

email.title: Email
email.description: A string containing an email address for the person

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifiers for the person. Where identifiers can be encoded as URLs, enter URLs here.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: DELETEME

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the publishing organization.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL to the homepage for the organization.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifiers for the person or organization. Where identifiers can be encoded as URLs, enter URLs here.

address.title: Address
address.description: Full address for the organization - e.g., “8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200”.

datePublished.title: Date Published
datePublished.description: Date of first publication for the resource.

subjectOf.title: Subjectof
subjectOf.description: A CreativeWork about the record - e.g., a related metadata document describing the record.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Submission type can include various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

name.title: Name or Title
name.description: Submission's name or title

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL address that serves as a reference to access additional details related to the record. It is important to note that this type of metadata solely pertains to the record itself and may not necessarily be an integral component of the record, unlike the HasPart metadata.

description.title: Description
description.description: Information about a related resource that is about or describes this resource - e.g., a related metadata document describing the resource.

version.title: Version
version.description: A text string indicating the version of the resource.

inLanguage.title: Language
inLanguage.description: The language of the content of the resource.

creativeWorkStatus.title: Resource Status
creativeWorkStatus.description: The status of this resource in terms of its stage in a lifecycle. Example terms include Incomplete, Draft, Published, and Obsolete.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A formal definition of a word, name, acronym, phrase, or similar. Often used in the context of category or subject classification, glossaries or dictionaries, product or creative work types, etc.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the term or item being defined.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the item being defined.
description.default: Data collection is ongoing or the resource is not completed

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A formal definition of a word, name, acronym, phrase, or similar. Often used in the context of category or subject classification, glossaries or dictionaries, product or creative work types, etc.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the term or item being defined.

description.title: Description
description.description: The resource is in draft state and should not be considered final. Content and metadata may change.
description.default: The resource has been replaced by a newer version, or the resource is no longer considered applicable

dateModified.title: Date Modified
dateModified.description: The date on which the resource was most recently modified or updated.

funding.title: Funding
funding.description: A Grant that directly or indirectly provide funding or sponsorship for creation of the dataset.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: This metadata represents details about a grant or financial assistance provided to an individual(s) or organization(s) for supporting the work related to the record.

name.title: Name or Title
name.description: A text string indicating the name or title of the grant or financial assistance.

description.title: Description
description.description: A text string describing the grant or financial assistance.

identifier.title: Funding Identifier
identifier.description: Grant award number or other identifier.

funder.title: Funder
funder.description: A Grant or monetary assistance that directly or indirectly provided funding or sponsorship for creation of the resource.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: DELETEME

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing the full name of the person. Personal name format: Family Name, Given Name

email.title: Email
email.description: A string containing an email address for the person

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifiers for the person. Where identifiers can be encoded as URLs, enter URLs here.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: DELETEME

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the provider organization or repository.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL to the homepage for the organization.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifiers for the person or organization. Where identifiers can be encoded as URLs, enter URLs here.

address.title: Address
address.description: Full address for the organization - e.g., “8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200”.

temporalCoverage.title: Temporalcoverage
temporalCoverage.description: The time period that the resource content applies to.

spatialCoverage.title: Place
spatialCoverage.description: The spatialCoverage of a CreativeWork indicates the place(s) which are the focus of the content. It is a subproperty of contentLocation intended primarily for more technical and detailed materials. For example with a Dataset, it indicates areas that the dataset describes: a dataset of New York weather would have spatialCoverage which was the place: the state of New York.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Represents the focus area of the record's content.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the focus area of the record's content.

address.title: Address
address.description: The address of the focus area.

geo.title: Geo
geo.description: Specifies the geographic coordinates of the place in the form of a point location, line, or area coverage extent.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A structured representation that describes the coordinates of a geographic feature (line or polygon).

line.title: Line
line.description: A line that is expressed as a series of two or more point objects separated by space.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A structured representation that describes the coordinates of a geographic feature (line or polygon).

polygon.title: Polygon
polygon.description: A polygon outlines the boundary of a specific region by a point-to-point path for which the starting and ending points are the same.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Geographic coordinates that represent a specific location on the Earth's surface. GeoCoordinates typically consists of two components: latitude and longitude.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Represents the angular distance of a location north or south of the equator, measured in degrees and ranges from -90 to +90 degrees.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Represents the angular distance of a location east or west of the Prime Meridian, measured in degrees and ranges from -180 to +180 degrees.

hasPart.title: Haspart
hasPart.description: Indicates an record or CreativeWork that is part of this record.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Submission type can include various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

name.title: Name or Title
name.description: Submission's name or title

url.title: URL
url.description: TODO

description.title: Description
description.description: Information about a related resource that is part of this resource.

isPartOf.title: Ispartof
isPartOf.description: Indicates an record or CreativeWork that this record, or CreativeWork (in some sense), is part of.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Submission type can include various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

name.title: Name or Title
name.description: Submission's name or title

url.title: URL
url.description: TODO

description.title: Description
description.description: Information about a related resource that this resource is a part of - e.g., a related collection.

associatedMedia.title: Associatedmedia
associatedMedia.description: A media object that encodes this CreativeWork. This property is a synonym for encoding.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: An item that encodes the record.

contentUrl.title: Contenturl
contentUrl.description: The direct URL link to access or download the actual content of the media object.

encodingFormat.title: Encodingformat
encodingFormat.description: Represents the specific file format in which the media is encoded.

contentSize.title: Contentsize
contentSize.description: Represents the file size, expressed in bytes, kilobytes, megabytes, or another unit of measurement.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the media object (file).

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: A downloadable form of the resource, at a specific location, in a specific format. Repeat if multiple files or if different formats/variations are available.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A downloadable form of the resource, at a specific location, in a specific format. Repeat if multiple files or if different formats/variations are available.

name.title: Name
name.description: A text string indicating the name of the content to be downloaded. This could be a file name or a descriptive name for the content file.

contentUrl.title: Content URL
contentUrl.description: A URL for the content to be downloaded.

encodingFormat.title: Encodingformat
encodingFormat.description: Text string indicating the file or media type, usually expressed using a MIME format.

contentSize.title: Contentsize
contentSize.description: A text string indicating the file size in megabytes

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: A text string with comments about the resource. For example, an explanation that provides additional information on how the dataset is being accessed or downloaded.

variableMeasured.title: Variable Measured
variableMeasured.description: The variableMeasured property can indicate (repeated as necessary) the variables that are measured in some dataset, either described as text or as pairs of identifier and description using PropertyValue.

includedInDataCatalog.title: Includedindatacatalog
includedInDataCatalog.description: Any other data catalog that contains a description of this resource.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A data catalog which contains this dataset.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the data catalog containing this dataset.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the data catalog.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL address to the data catalog.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The unique identifier for the data catalog. This is generated automatically by the system.

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: The creator, owner, or provider of the data catalog.
